description: Non-material amendments to application ref: P112564, comprising changes to internal layouts and windows on the south elevation.
decision_conditions:
This decision confirms the Council's agreement that following alternative wording of condition 2 of permission P112564 is acceptable:

"CONDITION: The development approved by planning permission P112564 shall be carried out in accordance with the following plans:

Plans approved by planning permission P112564:
MSS AL (0) 1001; 1010; 1013; 1014; 1015; 1016; MSS AL (0) 1019, 1020 Rev C, 1021 Rev D, 1026 Rev C, MSS-AL (0)-1030 Rev D, 1031 Rev D, 1033 Rev D, MSS-201 AL 9205 Rev A, 9250 Rev B, 9280 Rev A; MSS AL (0) 1040 Rev A, 1041 Rev A, 1050, 1051; MSS-201 AL 9-300; 

Additional Plans:
1032 Rev E; HTA_A_XX-XX-DR_2100; 2004; 2006; 2008; 2010.

Documents approved by planning permission P112564:
Lustalax  Lumisty window films 4 page specification; Design and Access Statement dated November 2011 prepared by HTA; Daylight and Sunlight Assessment dated 7th November 2011 prepared by GIA; Air Quality Assessment report dated 27 October 2011 prepared by SKM Enviros; MSS-AR-051 'Sustainability Statement and Energy Assessment dated 30th October 2011 prepared by HTA; Planning Statement dated November 2011prepared by Nathaniel Litchfield & Partners; Transport Statement dated 3rd November 2011 prepared by Transport Planning Practice; Arboricultural Implications Report and Tree Protection Method Statement dated 1st November 2011prepared by ACS Consulting (London); Extended Phase 1 Habitat Survey and Desktop Review dated 1st November 2011 prepared by URS; MSS-AR-1052 Statement of Community Consultation dated November 2011; Built Heritage Assessment dated November 2011 prepared by Nathaniel Litchfield & Partners; Archaeological Desk Based Assessment and Monitoring of Geotechnical Test Pits dated November 2011 prepared by CGMS Consulting; Phase 1 Geo-Environmental Assessment Report dated November 2010 prepared by URS; Phase 2 Geo-Environmental Assessment Report dated November 2010 prepared by URS; and SHG-MSS Plot Schedule Rev A (with SHG tenure allocation added 13/7/12).

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended, and for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning."
